<META name="r_object_id" content="0900fde9821771cb">

	<TITLE>SWALife Login Page</TITLE>
	<META HTTP-EQUIV="CACHE-CONTROL" CONTENT="NO-CACHE">
	<META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE">
	<META HTTP-EQUIV="Expires" CONTENT="0">
	<META http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset-big5">

	<link href='eipNoAuth/eipPortletStyles/loginStyles.css' rel="styleSheet" type="text/css">

	<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript"
		src="eipNoAuth/eipCommonJavaScript/eipGeneralFunctions.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript"
		src="eipNoAuth/eipCommonJavaScript/eipLoginFunctions.js"></script>

	<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1">

    <script type="text/javascript">
    	var host = location.hostname.substring(location.hostname.indexOf('.'));

		var retireeUrl, cwaUrl, idmUrl;

		retireeUrl = "https://retiree" + host;
		cwaUrl = "https://www15" + host + "/PortalWeb/cwa.jsp?test=test";
		idmUrl = "https://www26" + host + "/IDM/jsps/pwdmgt/ForgotPassword.jsf?returnUrl=https://www" + host;

		function submitForm() {

			document.swalifeLoginForm.action = "https://www" + host + "/login";

			loginLog("In SWALife login, submitForm, deleting all swalife cookies");
			deleteAllCookies();

			loginLog("In SWALife login, submitForm, adding cookie for authentication failure redirect");
			addRedirectCookies();
		}

		function goSubmit() {
			submitForm();

			document.swalifeLoginForm.submit();
		}

		function loginPageLink(url) {

			loginLog("In SWALife login, loginPageLink, url: " + url);

			loginLog("In SWALife login, loginPageLink, deleting all swalife cookies");
			deleteAllCookies();

			location.href = url;
		}

		function loginLog(msg) {
			if (window.console) {
				console.log(msg);
			}
		}

	</script>

</head>

<body onLoad="loginPageOnLoad()" bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
	<div class="centerPoint">
		<div class="loginDiv">
		    <!-- oblix may override action URL in form element below -->
			<FORM  class="loginForm" id="swalifeLoginForm" name="swalifeLoginForm"
			        action="login"
					target="_top" method="post"
					onsubmit="submitForm()">

				<div class="group">
					<input type="hidden" name=credID value="sjhgakjh3545kjh0_kJhgLlwurg03411_20a11%zx">

					<input type=hidden name=client_data value="SecurityDevice">

					<input type="text" class="input" id="useridField" name="username" autocomplete="off" style="position:absolute;left:157px;top:150px;"/>
					<input type="password" class="input" name="password" autocomplete="off" style="position:absolute;left:157px;top:180px;"/>

					<img src="eipNoAuth/eipImages/login/swa_login.jpg" width="400" height="350" border="0" usemap="#LoginMap">
					<map name="LoginMap">
						<area shape="rect" coords="294,144,332,180" href="javascript: goSubmit();">

						<area shape="rect" coords="152,199,281,234" href="javascript: loginPageLink(idmUrl);">
						<area shape="rect" coords="189,245,324,263" href="javascript: loginPageLink(retireeUrl);">
						<area shape="rect" coords="212,293,268,312" href="javascript: loginPageLink(cwaUrl);">
					</map>

					<!-- This input tag is used to submit the form when the user presses the enter key-->
					<input type="image" border="0" name="submit" width="0" height="0" style="position:absolute;left:0px;top:0px;" src="eipNoAuth/eipImages/login/loginThemeBlankWhite.jpg">
				</div>

			</FORM>
		</div>

	</div>
	<div style="position:absolute; width:100%; top:375px; text-align:center;">
		<div>
			<img src="eipNoAuth/eipImages/login/swa_login_missionstatement.jpg" border="0" height="178" width="670">
		</div>
	</div>
</body>
